articles.description: Warzone 2 expert IceManIsaac has unveiled the best meta loadout for the Lachmann Sub that increases maximizes its TTK and has "minimal recoil".
articles.content:

articles.author: Enrico Frahn
articles.title: Sony's 2023 Bravia lineup leaks, size options for A80L and A95L OLED TVs revealed - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: As expected, Sony's upcoming TVs for the 2023 model year can be identified by the letter "L" at the end of their respective model number. The leak comes just days before Sony is rumored to officially unveil its new Bravia lineup including the A80L OLED.
articles.content: While the leading manufacturer in the OLED TV market has already revealed its upcoming 2023 television sets a few weeks ago at CES, the Japanese tech giant Sony has yet to follow suit as the company … [+1534 chars]
